selected_quotes: FYI: Risk Measures and Fine Tuning of High Frequency Trading Strategies #Mkt
Paper on Optimal high frequency trading strategies with risk measures for terminal PnL & Inventory #HFT #Trading #Risk

citation.title: Risk Metrics and Fine Tuning of High Frequency Trading Strategies

author.name: David Stendahl
author.description: I focus on trading the global futures markets from a 100% systematic perspective. Tweets are commentary only. Trade at your own risk and analysis.
